articles.title: Canada weather: Visual guide to what's happening
articles.description: Maps, graphics and charts explaining the Canada and north-west US heatwave, with temperatures at nearly 50C.
articles.content:
By The Visual Journalism Team BBC News
A blistering heatwave has hit Canada and parts of the US, sending temperatures to dangerous highs of nearly 50C (122F).
Dozens of people have died.

articles.title: Canada's vaccination rate overtakes US
articles.description: Canada had a slow start on vaccinations compared to its neighbour but has now caught up to the US.
articles.content:

Canada has overtaken the US in second dose vaccination rates, after months of lagging behind its southern neighbour.

articles.content:

articles.title: Women's Olympic football: USA through after shootout win
articles.description: World champions the United States reach the semi-finals of the Olympic women's football tournament at Tokyo 2020 following a penalty shootout victory over the Netherlands.
articles.content:
The United States are aiming to win the Olympic Games for a fifth time
Tokyo Olympic Games on the BBC
